name: Pier 25
address: Hudson River Park, Pier 25, New York, NY 10013
description: Popular sand volleyball courts on the Hudson River waterfront in Tribeca. Pier 25 is one of NYC's premier volleyball destinations with league play and open courts.

name: Riverside Park (104th St)
address: Riverside Park, W 104th St, New York, NY 10025
description: Sand courts in the Upper West Side section of Riverside Park. Great views of the Hudson River. Free to play, bring your own net.

name: Central Park (Sheep's Meadow)
address: Central Park, Sheep's Meadow, New York, NY 10019
description: Grass volleyball in the heart of Central Park. Casual pickup games on Sheep's Meadow during warm months.

name: Pier 6 (Brooklyn Bridge Park)
address: Brooklyn Bridge Park, Pier 6, Brooklyn, NY 11201
description: Three sand volleyball courts at Pier 6 in Brooklyn Bridge Park with stunning Manhattan skyline views. Free and open to the public.

name: Domino Park
address: Domino Park, River St, Brooklyn, NY 11249
description: Small sand court at Domino Park along the Williamsburg waterfront. Great for casual games with East River views.

name: Rockaway Beach (73rd St)
description: Beach volleyball on the actual beach at Rockaway. The sand is real ocean beach sand. Best during summer months.

name: QBK Sports
address: 23-32 Borden Ave, Long Island City, NY 11101
description: Indoor sand volleyball facility in Long Island City. Year-round play with leagues, clinics, and open gym. Paid facility.

name: Hunter's Point South Park
address: Center Blvd, Long Island City, NY 11101
description: Sand volleyball courts in Hunter's Point South Park with views of the East River and Midtown Manhattan skyline.
